messages.content:
###Context###
Content Name: {{15.`Content Name`}}.
Content Type: {{15.`Content Type`}}.
Content Title: {{15.`Content Title`}}.
YouTube Title: {{15.`YouTube Title`}}.
YouTube Description: {{15.`YouTube Description`}}.
Image Size: {{15.`Image Size`}}.
Newsletter Type: {{15.`Newsletter Type`}}.
Newsletter Angle: {{15.`Newsletter Angle`}}.
Newsletter Key Points: {{15.`Newsletter Key Points`}}.
Newsletter Image Prompt: {{15.`Newsletter Image Prompt`}}.
Newsletter Final Version: {{15.`Newsletter Final Version`}}.
SEO Keywords: {{15.`SEO Keywords`}}.
Blogpost Title: {{15.`Blogpost Title`}}.
###Instruction###
In the context above, there are some fields that do not have any data. Your task is to remove those fields and keep the fields that have data.

BRAND GUIDELINES:
Brand Voice: {{15.`Brand Voice`}}.
Exclude These Words: {{15.`Excluded Words`}}.
Customer Avatar: {{15.`Customer Avatar`}}.
Write at a {{15.`Writing Grade`}} grade level.
CONTEXT:
Blogpost: {{15.`Blogpost Final Version`}}.
Transcript: {{15.Transcript}}.

{{66.choices[].message.content}}

DETAILS OF HOW TO STRUCTURE OUTPUT:
AI Output: This is where you will add your output. Do not provide any extra context, lines, headings or spaces. 
You must also append to the end of your output the following on a new line for each:
Prompt Type: {insert exactly as my input prompt}
Product Type: {insert exactly as my input prompt}
Copy ID: {insert exactly as my input prompt}

PROMPT:
Here is the prompt to complete: {{6.value}}

Create {{15.`Output Variations`}} variations in your output.
Your output must be in {{15.Language}} language.
